alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 6:24PM EDT until October 02 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Connecticut... Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam affecting New Haven and Fairfield Counties. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Moderate flood stage with numerous homes in the Maples area of Shelton affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM EDT Friday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Fri 5 pm: 15.9 Forecast: Fri 8 pm 17.0 Sat 2 am 16.9 Sat 8 am 15.6 Sat 2 pm 14.6 Sat 8 pm 13.9 Sun 2 am 13.2 Sun 8 am 12.6 Sun 2 pm 12.1 Sun 8 pm 11.6 Mon 2 am 11.0 Mon 8 am 10.5 Mon 2 pm 10.0 &&
